comments.author: Initia Nova.5917
comments.body: That actually will work for now, although a more official source than a user-uploaded image would be nice.

comments.author: sorenrye.7238
comments.body:
I haven’t looked at the map api yet.

But if you search the guildwars2.com site via google, you find:

  http://wiki.guildwars2.com/index.php?title=Widget:Zone_map&action=edit

I guess the page contains various links to resources for displaying map-information on the wiki. Fx the vista icon:

  http://wiki.guildwars2.com/images/d/d9/Vista.png

I don’t know if there is another ‘more official’ picture to use for creating maps obtained via the GW2 API Version 1. Maybe others can enlighten us. I don’t know why this information is not included in the docs (or is it???).

comments.author: Initia Nova.5917
comments.body: Does anyone know what the render link is for the vista icon? I’m in the process of building a map generating API, so I’m trying to find all of the map icons.
